admin_state_down.description: Set admin state up to false.

description.description: Set a description for the connection.

dpd.description: Ipsec connection. Dead Peer Detection attributes. 'action'-hold,clear,disabled,restart,restart-by-peer. 'interval' and 'timeout' are non negative integers.  'interval' should be less than 'timeout' value.  'action', default:hold 'interval', default:30,  'timeout', default:120.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

ikepolicy_id.description: IKE policy ID associated with this connection.

initiator.description: Initiator state in lowercase, default:bi-directional (choices: bi-directional, response-only)

ipsecpolicy_id.description: IPsec policy ID associated with this connection.

local_ep_group.description: Local endpoint group ID/name with subnet(s) for IPSec connection.

mtu.description: MTU size for the connection, default:1500.

name.description: Set friendly name for the connection.

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

peer_address.description: Peer gateway public IPv4/IPv6 address or FQDN.

peer_cidr.description: [DEPRECATED in Mitaka] Remote subnet(s) in CIDR format. Cannot be specified when using endpoint groups. Only applicable, if subnet provided for VPN service.

peer_ep_group.description: Peer endpoint group ID/name with CIDR(s) for IPSec connection.

peer_id.description: Peer router identity for authentication. Can be IPv4/IPv6 address, e-mail address, key id, or FQDN.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

vpnservice_id.description: VPN service instance ID associated with this connection.
